component.name: SN30 Pro for Android
component.summary: Firmware for the 8BitDo SN30 Pro for Android Game Controller

description.p: Updating the firmware on your SN30 Pro for Android device improves performance and adds new features.

component.url:
https://www.8bitdo.com/sn30-pro-for-xbox-cloud-gaming-on-android//url> CC0-1.0 Proprietary 8BitDo
This stable release fixes the following issues:
Enhanced the compatibility of Android games.
Enhanced the compatibility of Xbox Game Pass.
Fixed the Bluetooth reconnection slowly problem.
Note: The HID service has changed. The connected devices need to be unpaired and reconnected.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/hughsie/8bitdo-firmware/master/screenshots/SN30_Pro_for_Android.png Unplug the controller and hold down the Xbox button for 6 seconds to power off, then press the LB + RB + Xbox buttons both white LED and green LED blink and then reconnect the controller.
